settings.heading: No more makeshift activewear.
settings.text:
Finally, we made apparel with all your needs in mind (someone had to).

From functionality & fabric selection, to balancing performance with style.

No more compromise.

settings.title: Premium Quality
settings.text: We exist to serve and inspire individuals through fitness. We actually care.

settings.title: Made For You
settings.text: Our pieces are designed with our community. This brand is made specifically for you!

settings.title: Free Shipping + COD
settings.text: Free shipping all over Morocco! Pay cash on delivery - no online payment needed.

settings.title: Morea Athletes
settings.text:
A community of athletes with strong values. Here to support & inspire each other through fitness.

Everyday we show the world you don't need to compromise your values to achieve your goals.

settings.question: How does Cash on Delivery (COD) work?
settings.answer:
It's simple!

1. Place your order online

2. We ship your items

3. Pay cash when the delivery arrives at your door

No credit card or online payment needed! ðŸ’µ

settings.question: What is the Fabric like?
settings.answer: All of our images can be zoomed in on desktop which can help you get a better understanding of the texture. You can also scroll down and see the fabric icon which describes the key characteristics of the fabric for the particular item you're viewing.

settings.question: What if it's not the right fit for me?
settings.answer:
It's recommended to size up for a baggier & longer fit.

If you're still unsure on which size to get after looking at the size chart, feel free to message us on socials or email support@morea.com and we can help.

In any case, Exchanges for UK Orders are free (excluding items on sale). For International orders you will be responsible for the cost of shipping the item back.

settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
We offer a 14-day return policy. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original condition with tags attached.

For exchanges, we'll cover the shipping cost for UK orders.
